=
>Instead of using literals in the program (\n \r), use the
>System.getPrope=
rty("line.separator") and test against that if you need
>to test it.  Using=
 this and others in the code (i.e.
>getProperty("file.separator") or File.S=
EPARATOR, etc.) will greatly
>reduce the need to "port" to other OS's.
>
>-=
jason
